{"image": "//ukcdn.ar-cdn.com/recipes/port512/41f1cb3a-048d-4d99-bd95-4a04f0a8e27f.jpg", "ingredients": ["2 (400g) tins jackfruit pieces in salted water - drained and rinsed", "1 tablespoon vegetable oil", "1 tablespoon water, or more as needed", "2 tablespoons taco seasoning mix, or to taste", "4 taco shells", "120g salsa, or to taste"], "steps": ["Heat oil in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add jackfruit; cook and stir for 2 to 3 minutes. Add 1 tablespoon water and taco seasoning; stir until well combined, about 1 minute. Add additional water 1 tablespoon at a time as needed.", "Place a small amount of jackfruit in each taco shell; add 2 tablespoons salsa."], "name": "Jackfruit vegan tacos", "prep_time": "10 min", "cook_time": "3 min", "rating": 0.0, "recipe_url": "http://allrecipes.co.uk/recipe/45465/jackfruit-vegan-tacos.aspx"}
